column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I've been here twice and been blown away both times. Their dry aged rib eye is probably the best steak I've ever had
column2: but their sides are also amazing. Their brussels sprouts are perfectly caramelized
column3: their truffle mac is cheesy and truffle-y
column4: and their chocolate cream pie is incredibly decadent and rich. Would recommend!!!
